billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Excludes certain tuition and other education costs from aggregate annual income in determining eligibility for limited profit housing projects
summary: Allows residents of rentals and cooperatives to deduct certain tuition and school related expenses in an amount not to exceed one thousand five hundred dollars for each dependent child who is a full-time college student for purposes of determining probable aggregate annual income for purposes of eligibility for admission to limited-profit housing company projects.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the private housing finance law, in relation to excluding certain tuition costs from aggregate annual income in determining eligibility for occupancy of certain housing projects
